Chinese.name: 将EventBridge转储的cos文件聚合
Chinese.description: 本示例会将EventBridge转储的cos小文件 聚合为大文件
Chinese.attention: 在使用本示例代码时需要传递相关的环境变量给函数。

English.name: concat_cos_file_for_eb
English.description: This example will download file(created by EventBridge) from cos, concat them, and upload to another bucket
English.attention: When using this sample code, you need to pass some env variables to this function.
